### Writing content

Write content in [Markdown](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/markdown-basics.html).

Quarto's Markdown supports everything
figures, tables, bibliography, etc.

It also supports lots of extra features, like
diagrams with `mermaid` and `GraphViz`, and
even LaTeX equations: 

$$
E = mc^2
$$
:::
